reviews.content: So much better than most split apps
reviews.author: HailJebus

reviews.content: We tell everyone we know about this app. It has made dining out so easy. But PLEASE either add Venmo support or remove the option from your app. I’m tired of explaining that it doesn’t work to people we introduce it to.
reviews.author: Charger Stone

reviews.content: Great app! I finally figured out how to delete the random “discount”. Found this app through my friends. You can edit tip.. add discount.. all of it. Love it!
reviews.author: MsSuzanne

reviews.content: Been using it for years and is great for splitting annoying bills. My only feedback would be that it would be great if you specify quantity per user on items. All that said, this is amazing as a Free app and props to the developers for never pushing any ads. Would pay for this app tbh
reviews.author: Mirza Rahman

reviews.content: I was not able to use the pay with Venmo feature. It would not connecting to my Venmo account.  Also, I was not able to enter my bill information correctly.  The option to add a manual tip and other text was displaying off the screen, and I could not select it. Ultimately, I went with another bill splitter app this time and it was a breeze.
reviews.author: [Martimus]

reviews.content: Great app! The ability to scan a check and it puts it all on the app and ready to divy up the tab!
reviews.author: Matt Wuzz Up

reviews.content: I love this app and use it all the time and tell my friends to do the same. Unfortunately, my international friends cannot use this app because it is only available on the US App Store. Please expand who can use this app! ❤️
reviews.author: MargCarl456

reviews.content: Some of the manual edit elements can’t be clicked on the iPhone 16
reviews.author: Hoj Dawg Millionaire

reviews.content: I love this app! This is the perfect way to split a group dinner. I just take a picture of the receipt and pass my phone around the table for everyone to claim their dishes! And their birthday split feature and adjustable tip/tax and splitting dishes is amazing.
reviews.author: Zaataar

reviews.content: Still requires a double check that the scan worked, but when it does, it’s great!
reviews.author: Joe7291276292

reviews.content: You can no longer put a comma when editing the prices. So the app is useless.
reviews.author: Z1620482

reviews.content: Most useful app when splitting tabs
reviews.author: xMoKoLoKox

reviews.content: It’s great when it works but if it’s a receipt from like, the diner, it doesn’t read correctly.
reviews.author: Samiferjones

reviews.content:
I have been using this app for close to a year now and it has been absolutely great! The ease of splitting the bill after just snapping a picture of the check is such a great idea. I’m surprised at how well it works. I have only had to edit my bill a few times in all of the number of times that I use it. 

I go out with my friends all the time and this is the easiest way to save time at the end without having to do the calculations of tax and tip for each person. The only things I wish were added is a slightly better UI and for the eventual Venmo connectivity which would be amazing. Developers, if you are reading this, great job and keep up the great work. If you have any questions or want any more feedback please reach out as I want to help this app be the best it can be.
reviews.author: Turí L.

reviews.content: Great design just wish software was a bit better when importing info. Has still been a game changer for splitting bills and getting people to include tax/ tip with their Venmos lol
reviews.author: titi9464

reviews.content: While the app may have its quirks and occasionally require manual adjustments, it's overall a fantastic app. And the best part? It's completely free with no subscription fees.
reviews.author: AG.9519

reviews.content: Ever go to a dinner with a group of 4+ friends? Some people drink, some don’t? People got different meals at different price points? It is such a hassle to calculate what everyone owed to the brave soul who puts their card down. This app has changed that experience for me. I’m no longer nervous to put my card down because I know I can just use this app to calculate totals within 5 minutes. It does take some manual work (spot checking that the item costs are correct and verifying who ordered what) but I love this app so much. The only point for improvement is to have better receipt recognition!
reviews.author: Hayley Pogue

reviews.content: The Venmo feature doesn’t work to connect Venmo. It would be cool if there was a feature that would allow you to mark who has already paid you (potential to even keep a running tab for friends that notoriously not pay). Any plans to add Zelle?
reviews.author: Tamzies-

reviews.content: Have loved this App so far and makes going out with friends so much easier! I feel more comfortable placing my card down knowing who precisely owes what.
reviews.author: Macattack021

reviews.content: Not bad. It sometimes doesn’t know how to separate things from pictures but after checking over it, it’s ok. You review it and make edits if you have to but overall it’s been very useful.
reviews.author: Impsguiggjykj

reviews.content: I love to collect credit card points and the best way to do it is with friend group dinners! the worst part is dividing it all up at the end of the night and making sure all the tax and tip are split evenly—I used to spend a decent time dissecting and calculating totals on my ipad but with the tab app my life is so much better!!! I tell all my friends to get it and they all love it (they call me the tab app influencer). pls never disappear from the app store!
reviews.author: Sunberry9800

reviews.content: Great calculator, but the Venmo auth screen takes me to two blank icons and a non-functioning button inside Venmo. Running latest version of both apps. Fix this and it’s golden
reviews.author: danielsircar

reviews.content: this app was so annoying to use so I switched to ChatGPT and it worked so much faster and accurate!
reviews.author: _hannah_108_

reviews.content: This app is so user friendly and easy to use. Makes splitting bills so much easier! Especially love the birthday feature
reviews.author: swimgirl18

reviews.content: I like the app, it’s super easy to use and fast to translate the receipt after taking a picture/uploading. But the Venmo connection doesn’t work - I’ve had the app since Jan/Feb and have retired constantly. I still use the app in-spite of this due to the ease of use but Venmo connect was the main reason I downloaded this. So all I do now after divvying everything is screenshot and send to the group so they can send me the money - but would be more efficient to just request from the app like it is marketed to be able to.
reviews.author: Aimmiii

reviews.content: It’s a decent app for splitting, but me and my friends can never seem to connect our Venmo’s successfully. Wish they would fix that bug.
reviews.author: s@m1998h€rr

reviews.content: It misread the tax amount and did not let me fix it.
reviews.author: Rosenvibes

reviews.content: Took a photo added two things off receipt it added tax bill came out less than the tax amount doesn’t add up at all.
reviews.author: SHELLEY🐾🐾

reviews.content:
This app is both convenient and frustrating to use. Receipt parsing takes a lot of the effort out of bill splitting (👍) but it gets it parses items correctly maybe 70% of the time. Manually editing an item is not a huge pain, but the editing form is buggy and you have to backspace-delete and the whole text up to the point of a typo (selecting a single word in-place does not work for some reason).

The tip view is helpful but additional tips get reset if you reopen the app, altering the original total. 

Some issues with the bill drafting and sharing experience: 

You can share a link to the bill in progress but if you don’t make an account the entire bill disappears when you reopen the app and you have to punch everything in again. This is odd because you can still “join” the bill again through the link after making an account, but can not go back to continue editing it.

Overall this is an app that saves a lot of
time when it works well but wastes time when it does not.
reviews.author: Consumer Girlie

reviews.content: I never review apps but I must for this one. This has got to be the best app I’ve downloaded on my iPhone ever. Being able to so easily spilt bills including tip and tax is amazing. And being able to say only a portion of the group shared an item is a game changer. I love it! Thank you!
reviews.author: MadDog741

reviews.content: So many great features built into this app. I thoroughly enjoy it!
reviews.author: GodIsKingandQueen

reviews.content: Love this app, makes things so easy when dining with friends!
reviews.author: kfelka

reviews.content: Works Great!
reviews.author: that_asian_bean

reviews.content: Great app except adjusting the tax rate doesn’t seem to be available. Tried to google for info but couldn’t find anything.
reviews.author: cbeans91

reviews.content:
OCR recognition is on point. I love the divide and claim feature.

I would like to kindly like to ask for the following:

1. Undo Split feature
2. Fix Connect to Venmo feature—this is not working and seems broken. :(
2. Use QR code as “Share Code”
reviews.author: Pappa Kapp

reviews.content:
This should be 5 stars for what it is supposed to do.  Works well on small bills.  It gets confused on larger bills with multiple taxes and/or subtotals.

It would be great if we could edit all items, add new items, and remove items.
reviews.author: MistrB01

reviews.content: awesome app!! works great, makes splitting costs much easier
reviews.author: Duke the luke

reviews.content: There’s no ability to add tax manually, it’s broken
reviews.author: Jesse OH

reviews.content: Love this app.  I now actually get paid back from my brother in law because I split the bill immediately so he can't "forget" to pay my husband back!
reviews.author: Agace3042

reviews.content: Easy to use gets the job done
reviews.author: E-Dez

reviews.content: This app makes splitting the bill very easy. Snap a picture of the bill and in a few taps you’re able to see exactly how much everyone owes the person who put their card down. I love it!!
reviews.author: Mra.2002

reviews.content: It's a good idea but the iOS app is buggy for bills you enter manually
reviews.author: dcff3677

reviews.content:
I love this app so much and it’s been a game changer going out with friends! It’s so easy to pass my phone around and have everyone claim what they ordered, even when there’s 10+ people. I have told a bunch of friends in the industry and they are also obsessed, making their lives easier. 
My only complaints/requests are
1. It’s not intuitive to get back into a check after you’re done with it and also how do I see the picture I took? 
2. A request for a feature (that I’m fairly certain doesn’t exist right now) so that a user can mark who paid? When trying to venmo after a few days, it’s difficult to remember who actually paid.
reviews.author: Stucks327

reviews.content:
I love the idea of this app - and if it worked properly it would be a lifesaver. However this app is terrible at itemizing items. I used a very clear photo of my receipt- the app included the “subtotal”, “tax”, and “total” amounts as line items that I then had to manually delete. Then, the app added a 58 dollar tip and I have no idea where they came from even after investigating my receipt. A 20% tip on our bill (which we left) was only ~20 dollars. 

This app also does not let you edit the dollar amount of tax charged (in my case the app put it down as 0, which isn’t correct), which seems like a massive oversight. You should at least have the option to manually enter the amount of percentage of tax charged considering how bad the app is at itemizing. 

I am giving two stars, simply because the app DID itemize the actual items on my receipt correctly, with correct dollar amount and (close enough) names. With some manual override, I was about to get the bill within ~10 dollars of the actual amount paid - so in the end it can still be useful. This app has a lot of potential, it just needs a better algorithm at itemizing, and a manual override feature for the amount of tax paid.
reviews.author: Christian Joseph Grant

reviews.content:
The app should be great but it’s not super good at reading bills nor does it allow me to
Input decimals.
reviews.author: Bunny hats

reviews.content:
There’s a bug where the tax calculation is the subtotal + tip, bringing the grand total >2x the subtotal.

The app didn’t have this issue before so this must be some new kind of bug
reviews.author: komunculus

reviews.content: No notes.
reviews.author: craig_smith

reviews.content: Why does it add all itemized items, and than also add the subtotal. Doubling the amount, think you have a bug. Also, you should have a currency or at minimum a way to multiple all lines by a currency percent.
reviews.author: Dane review

reviews.content: Great tool for group to split the payment. However the Venmo doesn’t work
reviews.author: ShoMaria

reviews.content: Does the job, but the interface is a little outdated. I also found it frustrating that I couldn’t delete when I selected someone paying me accidentally.
reviews.author: Mferna12
